Rulings.Edison:
●Psychic Snail's effect targets 1 of your other Psychic-Type monsters. Paying 800 Life Points is a cost.
●Psychic Snail's effect can be activated multiple times during the same turn, as long as you can pay the cost.

Rulings.Base: 1. The effect of "Psychic Snail" targets 1 of your other Psychic-Type monsters. Paying 800 Life Points is a cost.\n2. The effect of "Psychic Snail" can be activated multiple times during the same turn, as long as you can pay the cost.
